content: i am unsure of the exact amount of cotton yarn needed but i was able to make the ones pictured with a very small amount i would guess there was only about 1/3 left of a 2 oz ball and even after making one of these it was still not completely gone i have not actually tried to follow this pattern yet to make sure that i didn t leave anything out so if you notice anything that seems off please let me know so i can adjust thanks
